name: SORTCards
description: Web App for tracking employee attendance, 201 filing and payrolls.
technology: Laravel, Vue.js - PHP, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL

name: PAYHRA
description: Web App for tracking employee attendance, 201 filing and payrolls.
technology: Laravel, Vue.js - PHP, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL

name: RedLemon Digital Media
technology: WordPress - PHP, HTML5, CSS, jQuery, MySQL

name: FICCO - First Community Cooperative
description: Website for a local Cooperative. Used BeTheme for the general layout and did a custom styling based on the approved design. Animation on the homepage is done using GSAP library.
technology: WordPress - PHP, HTML5, CSS, jQuery, MySQL

name: ElectricHub
description: An eCommerce site for electric bikes, scooters, and motorcycles. Used WooCommerce for this and integrated custom shipping fee rates. Our designer laid out all the layout/design and I did the backend.
technology: WordPress (WooCommerce) - PHP, HTML5, CSS, jQuery, MySQL

name: DriveTime - Advice Center
description: A website intended for DriveTime customers which provide advices and tips about business and finances. This is built from the ground-up using the Bones starter theme with a custom permalink rewrite rules. A non-responsive site.
technology: WordPress - PHP, HTML5, SASS, jQuery, MySQL

name: Digma
description: A collection of articles and events about Arts and Artitechture. Schools and organizations can submit their events using a custom form and there's also a donation page which is integrated using PayPal API. I worked mostly on the client side, while my partner on the server side. This is built from the ground-up using the Bones starter theme.
technology: WordPress - PHP, HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, MySQL

name: DriveTime - Complaint Center
description: A complaint center which allows DriveTime customers to submit their concerns and complaints. Also have a couple of FAQ articles. This is the 2nd time to use Bones starter theme and SASS. A responsive website.
technology: WordPress - PHP, HTML5, SASS, jQuery, MySQL

name: Paragon Life Homes
description: This is a company website which sepcializes on corporate homebuilding. This also displays available and in-development community homes mostly on Las Vegas, Nevada area. Built mostly using a Page Builder plugin with ofcourse, a custom-styled templates.
technology: WordPress - PHP, HTML5, CSS, jQuery, MySQL

name: Global Leadership Institute
description: As the website says, this is a "Non-Profit, Non-Governmental Organization. Serves as an International Leadership Research & Development Organization, creating programmes & strategies...". The homepage event and details can be dynamically set from the WP dashboard.
technology: WordPress - PHP, HTML5, CSS, jQuery, MySQL

name: DriveTime Dealership
description: A single delearship website from DriveTime specifically for Mesa, Arizona branch. This shows list of cars and details based on the Make and Model, which is fetched from DriveTime's internal API. First project to use Bones starter theme and SASS.
technology: WordPress - PHP, HTML5, SASS, jQuery, MySQL

name: Leyeah Packaging
description: Company website which specialized on designing and manufacturing packaging materials.
technology: WordPress - PHP, HTML5, CSS, jQuery, MySQL

name: FreeBosh
description: Helped with the development of FreeBosh website and did most of the pages. FreeBosh is an art website design company.
technology: WordPress - PHP, HTML5, CSS, jQuery, MySQL
